Package io.jans.orm.ldap.operation.impl

Class LdapOperationServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jans.orm.ldap.operation.impl.LdapOperationServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LdapOperationService, io.jans.orm.operation.PersistenceOperationService
    public class LdapOperationServiceImpl
extends Object
implements LdapOperationService
    OperationsFacade is the base class that performs all the ldap operations using connectionpool
    Author:
    Pankaj, Yuriy Movchan
